titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New York University Archives Collection of Bookplates and Engravers Plates MC.403
titlestmt.author: Aki Snyder

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-05-29 15:37:28 -0400.

did.unittitle: New York University Archives Collection of Bookplates and Engravers Plates

physdesc.extent: in 1 card box and a half manuscript box

did.abstract: The New York University Archives Collection of Bookplates and Engravers Plates (circa 20th century) consists of bookplates and engravers plates. Examples of images found on these plates include the NYU Torch, the NYU Libraries logos, insignia of other libraries that donated materials to NYU, and in memoriam designs representing individuals who donated to the library.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The New York University Archives Collection of Bookplates and Engravers Plates (circa 20th century) consists of 7 engravers plates and 3 folders of book plates. Examples of images found on these plates include the NYU Torch, the NYU Libraries logos, insignia of other libraries that donated materials to NYU, and in memoriam designs representing individuals who donated to the library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by format.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials in this collection were transferred from the New York University Archives Photograph Collection (PHOTO 00001) in May 2024. The accession number associated with this collection is 2024.044.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: In May 2024, book plates and engravers plates were removed from the New York University Archives Photograph Collection (PHOTO 00001) and made into a new collection, MC 403. Metal plates were wrapped in tissue paper and placed in an acid free box. Printed books plates were rehoused in an acid-free box and folders. Materials were described on the collection-level and inventoried at the box-level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; New York University Archives Collection of Bookplates and Engravers Plates; MC 403; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University
